query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Beat It', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and popular culture?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal prowess and tracks like 'I Will Always Love You' redefine pop and R&B music in the 1990s?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to reinvent his image and sound influence the landscape of rock music and popular culture throughout his career?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's exceptional songwriting and stage presence shape Queen's legacy in rock history?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's blend of pop and R&B, along with her vocal technique, impacted the music trends of the 2010s and 2020s?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's music and message promote social change and awareness of Rastafarian culture on an international level?
